title: Bangkok’s Amarin Plaza to be rejuvenated as Gaysorn Amarin
dc:creator: Retail Asia
description:
read the original version on: www.retailnews.asia

Gaysorn Property is revamping the Amarin Plaza shopping centre in the heart of Bangkok with the property due to reopen in the fourth quarter of next year as Gaysorn Amarin. The complex will be reopened under the concept “Old-New Spirit” – featuring a blend of modern design and Roman post-modern architecture. The design is in […]

The post Bangkok’s Amarin Plaza to be rejuvenated as Gaysorn Amarin appeared first on Retail News Asia.
